results.title: Kids (D)
results.creator_credit: Miramax Films, Independent Pictures, Excalibur Films, Leigh Blake, Michael Chambers, Patrick Panzarella, Gus Van Sant, Cary Woods and Larry Clark
results.brief_description: ‘Kids’ is a shocking movie representing an underground youth culture of excess and liberty to the extreme in an inner-city urban habitat. The viewer is taken on a 24-hour urban jaunt, alluding to amoral grit and an excessive depiction of nihilistic youth as a sensationalized pseudo-documentary. The film focuses on freckled boy Telly (Leo Fitzpatrick), whose idea of safe sex is to only have sex with virgins. His theory is disproven when a girl from one of his past unprotected passions tests positive to HIV. Cast includes Leo Fitzpatrick (Telly), Sarah Henderson (Girl #1), Justin Pierce (Casper) and Joseph Chan (Deli Owner). Written by Larry Clark, Leo Fitzpatrick and Jim Lewis. Peter Bici, Jeff Pang, Harold Hunter, and many others from the movie are professional skateboarders on the Zoo York team.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Miramax Films, Independent Pictures, Excalibur Films, Leigh Blake, Michael Chambers, Patrick Panzarella, Gus Van Sant, Cary Woods and Larry Clark

results.title: Kids' Picks: Elmer Fudd
results.brief_description: A series of children’s classic cartoon characters from the studios of Warner Brothers and MGM. 1. “Cobweb Hotel” featuring a sinister singing spider and newlywed flies. 2. “An Itch in Time” featuring Elmer Fudd. 3. “Falling Hare” featuring Bugs Bunny. 4. “Bars and Stripes Forever”. 5. “Doggone Tired”. 6. “Chicken a la King”. 7. “The Sheepish Wolf”. Rated: G

results.title: Kidneys (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre and Institut für Film und Bild
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Exploring the Body”.
Concise and detailed animation clearly defines the complex inner structures and functions of the Kidneys. Filmed segments emphasise the relationship of healthy kidneys to the well being of the body.

results.title: Kidnapped; Robinson Crusoe
results.creator_credit: Air Programs International, Walter J Hucker and Leif Gram
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Storytime Collection”.
Features 2 classic children’s stories. In “Kidnapped”, a Scottish orphan, David Balfour is betrayed by his wicked uncle, Ebeneezer, and kidnapped and sold into slavery. His motive is to guarantee Unk’s inheritance over David’s genuine inheritance. It’s up to David to prove that he is the true Master of Shaws and expose his uncle’s evil plot. This tape also includes Daniel Defoe’s classic tale of Robinson Crusoe, marooned on a Pacific Island and the exciting and dangerous adventures he has.

results.title: Kidnapped; Catriona
results.brief_description: A dramatisation of Robert Louis Stevenson’s well known tale that has captured the imagination of generations of readers. When young David Balfour meets runaway Jacobite rebel, Alan Breck, a survivor of the Battle of Culloden a series of exciting adventures ensue in the bleak Scottish landscape. This video also features the lesser known sequel “Catriona”. Starring Michael Caine and Jack Hawkins.

results.title: Kidnapped
results.brief_description: Based on the story by Robert Louis Stevenson, the film follows the adventures of David Balfour (James Macarthur) and his heroic attempts to regain his inherited property - the house and lands of the Shaws in Scotland. Cast includes John McIntyre, Peter Finch and Miles Malleson.

results.title: Kidnapped
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australian mosaic”.
In the late 19th Century thousands of South Sea Islander people were kidnapped and taken to Northern Queensland as “kanakas”, slave labourers, to work on the sugar plantations. This documentary traces the history of the Pacific people in Australia and includes interviews with descendants of the slave-labourers, both in Queensland and the South Pacific. With the advent of the White Australia Policy many thousands of South-Sea Islanders were deported from Australia, but many others fled the authorities and lived in the Queensland bush. Their children and grandchildren now form a strong Islander community in and around the city of Mackay in Queensland.

results.title: Kid nerd
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Adam Symansky and Shereen Jerrett
results.brief_description: Former self confessed ‘nerds’, offer candid views on what it was like to be isolated and bullied in high school and how their lives have turned out. Although those interviewed share their moments of past pain, most of them have gone on to successful and creative ventures, which may have only been possible because of their distinct personalities. An entertaining documentary that nerds and non nerds alike will be able to relate to.
